title: #DeleteFacebook? Privacy proves hard to protect online
text:
#DeleteFacebook? Privacy proves hard to protect online 10:06am EDT - 02:12 
Anyone tempted to #DeleteFacebook after the personal data of millions of users fell into the hands of a political consultancy is still likely to be monitored by the social network, which tracks nearly 30 percent of global website traffic.   
Anyone tempted to #DeleteFacebook after the personal data of millions of users fell into the hands of a political consultancy is still likely to be monitored by the social network, which tracks nearly 30 percent of global website traffic.  //reut.rs/2GmCuun
